name: Portable Flip Scoreboard 6 Digits Tabletop Score Flipper Waterproof Flip Score Keeper Multi-Sport Scoreboard Flipper PVC Manual Scorekeeper for Indoor Outdoor Basketball Tennis Volleyball Soccer
short_description: 【Waterproof Material】The flip scoreboard numbers are constructed from quality PVC, ensuring long-lasting durability and resistance to wear and tear. Its waterproof properties make it suitable for outdoor use, whether on basketball courts, tennis matches, or volleyball games.

【Easy Score Updates】Featuring ergonomic finger slots, the flip score board enables quick and hassle-free score changes during gameplay. The snap rings securely hold the number cards in place. This design minimizes distractions, allowing players to focus on the game without worrying about scorekeeping errors.

【Clear Visibility】The score flipper scoreboard has 6 digits, 2 of which are blue, 2 are red, and the remaining 2 are darker, ranging from 00 to 99. The white numbers make it easy to read the score from a distance. The scoreboard displays "Home Team" and "Away Team" below the number card, clearly showing the scores of both teams.

【Portable Design】With its slim and lightweight design, the flip card scoreboard easily fits into a gym bag or sports equipment case. The compact size (17 x 6 x 8 inches) and durable construction make it ideal for travel, whether for backyard games or professional tournaments.

【Multi-Sport Versatility】This flip sports scoreboard is designed for various sports, including basketball, tennis, and volleyball, making it a versatile addition to any game. While the large, bold numbers ensure visibility from all angles. Its adaptability makes it ideal for both casual and competitive settings.

name: Portable Scoreboard – Wearable Attachable Tabletop Score Keeper for Volleyball, Beach Volleyball, Cornhole, Tennis, Ping Pong, Table Tennis, Billiards
short_description: *Hang and Attach Anywhere:* With its unique hangable and attachable design, you can place this mini scoreboard wherever you need it. Hang it around your nect or on a wall, fence, or attach / clip it to your beach chair, referee chair, ball cart or Boardee Beach Volleyball Pole System or other fixtures. It's your scoreboard, your way.

*Manual Scorekeeping:* No need for batteries or digital displays. This scoreboard allows for straightforward manual scorekeeping, ensuring you never miss a point or update. It's a reliable and traditional approach to score tracking. You don't have to worry about electricity and battery.

*Portable and Compact:* Take your scoreboard with you on the go. It's lightweight and compact, making it easy to transport and set up at various venues and locations. It is perfect for use by referees, players, coaches, event organizers, and spectators to keep and display the score during games.

*Multi-Sport Versatility:* This scoreboard isn't just for beach volleyball; it's suitable for a wide range of sports and games. Keep score for beach volleyball, table tennis, beach tennis, streetball, tennis, badminton, or even use it for board games and card games during your family gatherings.

*Portable and Visible:* Boardee is flat, compact, and convenient, yet it sacrifices nothing in terms of visibility. Other scoreboards are triangular and bulky. Boardee is small and light enough to be carried anywhere and its numbers are big enough to be seen from far away.
